content: नायिका {@--1@} A mistress. {@--2@} A wife. {@--3@} The heroine of a poetic composition. (According to <ls>S. D.</ls> a नायिका is of three kinds स्वा or स्वीया, अन्या or परकीया, and साधारणस्त्री. For further classification, see <ls>S. D. 97-112</ls>, and <ls>Rasamañjarī 3-94</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> अन्यस्त्री also). {@--4@} A kind of musk.
